episode_event_ayumi_pokekid/4001_1101_01:
...Unfortunately, we couldn’t find the talking Eevee
everyone on Pasio’s been whispering about.
episode_event_ayumi_pokekid/4001_1101_02: So I’d like to ask the viewers for help!
episode_event_ayumi_pokekid/4001_1101_03:
If you have any information about the talking
Eevee, please leave a comment!
episode_event_ayumi_pokekid/4001_1001_05: Hmm. This video didn’t end how I wanted it to...
episode_event_ayumi_pokekid/4001_1001_06:
Well, maybe that means we should find the talking
Eevee ourselves! Let’s go, partner!
episode_event_ayumi_pokekid/4002_1001_02: Hmm... I’m still not good enough!
episode_event_ayumi_pokekid/4002_1001_10: I’m Eve, a Trainer from Galar.
episode_event_ayumi_pokekid/4002_1001_11: I love to play pretend Pokémon!
episode_event_ayumi_pokekid/6801_1001_01: Eevee have all kinds of potential!
episode_event_ayumi_pokekid/6801_1001_02:
There may still be all kindsa strange Eevee out
there!
episode_event_ayumi_pokekid/4003_1001_01: Ah, I get it now! I guess I got mixed up!
episode_event_ayumi_pokekid/4003_1001_04:
I’m Elaine. I came from Pallet Town with my
partner Eevee!
episode_event_ayumi_pokekid/4003_1001_05: Pallet Town?! That’s where Professor Oak lives!
episode_event_ayumi_pokekid/4003_1001_06: That’s right! You know a lot, huh?
episode_event_ayumi_pokekid/4003_1001_07:
Of course! Every Poké Kid reads Professor
Oak’s books!
episode_event_ayumi_pokekid/4003_1001_08: So you must be studying a lot about Pokémon!
episode_event_ayumi_pokekid/4003_1001_09:
But it’s kind of a shame you weren’t the talking
Eevee...
episode_event_ayumi_pokekid/4003_1001_10: You’re looking for a talking Eevee?
episode_event_ayumi_pokekid/4003_1001_11: I’m looking for it too! Let’s search together!
episode_event_ayumi_pokekid/4003_1001_13: Really?! That would be amazing. Thank you, Eve!
episode_event_ayumi_pokekid/4004_1001_02:
I’ve never seen one here, or in the Hisui region
for that matter...
episode_event_ayumi_pokekid/4004_1001_03:
I don’t think I’ve seen any Galaxy Expedition Team
survey reports that mention a talking Eevee either.
episode_event_ayumi_pokekid/4004_1001_05: No, it’s fine! Thank you for your time!
episode_event_ayumi_pokekid/4005_1001_01: Hmm. I’ve never heard of a talking Eevee...
episode_event_ayumi_pokekid/4005_1001_03:
If there actually was an Eevee that stood out like
that, don’t you think that it would be famous
by now?
episode_event_ayumi_pokekid/4005_1001_04:
If it actually exists, maybe it’s hiding the fact that
it can talk.
episode_event_ayumi_pokekid/4005_1001_07: Your Eevee are so cute! Can I touch them?
episode_event_ayumi_pokekid/4005_1001_08: There, there... That’s a good little Eevee!
episode_event_ayumi_pokekid/4006_1001_01:
I don’t know anyone else who knows a lot
about Eevee...
episode_event_ayumi_pokekid/4006_1001_02: Yeah... Maybe it doesn’t exist after all?
episode_event_ayumi_pokekid/4007_1001_03: She’s gotta know about Eevee! Let’s talk to her!
episode_event_ayumi_pokekid/4007_1001_07:
Y-you surprised me... Don’t come up to me
like that...
episode_event_ayumi_pokekid/4007_1001_10:
Wait, are you a Poké Kid? I saw that outfit back
in Galar...
episode_event_ayumi_pokekid/4007_1001_12: Yeah, well... I’m actually from Galar...
episode_event_ayumi_pokekid/4007_1001_13:
That, and I’ve kinda wanted an Eevee suit for
awhi— Actually, never mind...
episode_event_ayumi_pokekid/4007_1001_14: Um, we’re looking for a talking Eevee!
episode_event_ayumi_pokekid/4007_1001_15: Have you heard anything about a rare Eevee?
episode_event_ayumi_pokekid/4007_1001_18:
Well... I don’t really know anything about a
talking Eevee...
episode_event_ayumi_pokekid/4007_1001_19:
But I do know about a secret gathering of
Eevee fans...
episode_event_ayumi_pokekid/4007_1001_20:
You might get the chance to hear stories that
wouldn’t come up among typical Eevee fans.
episode_event_ayumi_pokekid/4007_1001_21:
If you don’t already know about the gathering,
they’ll chuck you out, so I’ll introduce you.
episode_event_ayumi_pokekid/4007_1001_22: Plus I...kinda wanna meet a talking Eevee, too.
episode_event_ayumi_pokekid/4007_1001_24: I’m Penny, a student from Paldea.
episode_event_ayumi_pokekid/4008_1001_01: Is this where secret Eevee fans gather?
episode_event_ayumi_pokekid/4008_1001_02:
Wh-who are you?! How did you know about this
place?
episode_event_ayumi_pokekid/4008_1001_03: Ah, it’s OK. They won’t tell anyone.
episode_event_ayumi_pokekid/4008_1001_06:
I’ve never heard of one, but the others might
know something.
episode_event_ayumi_pokekid/4008_1001_07:
Why don’t you ask around? You can even hang
out with the Eevee while you do. You came all
this way, after all.
episode_event_ayumi_pokekid/4008_1001_11: Oh, wow. That’s actually quite good.
episode_event_ayumi_pokekid/4008_1001_12: Do the Secret Technique Chop Down, partner!
episode_event_ayumi_pokekid/4008_1001_13: Wow! That Eevee can use a Secret Technique?
episode_event_ayumi_pokekid/4008_1001_15: Real mysterious Eevee you got there...
episode_event_ayumi_pokekid/4008_1001_17:
Interesting...I guess it’s hard to see what’s under
your nose!
episode_event_ayumi_pokekid/4008_1001_21: Maybe there isn’t a talking Eevee?
episode_event_ayumi_pokekid/4008_1001_22:
Would a Pokémon even use human language...?
I mean, is it even physically possible?
episode_event_ayumi_pokekid/4009_1001_03:
You’ve grown an awful lot since you first came to
Pasio!
episode_event_ayumi_pokekid/4009_1001_04: Great job! You’re keeping up with me!
episode_event_ayumi_pokekid/4009_1001_07:
Wait...seriously? You’ve got some good
connections...
episode_event_ayumi_pokekid/4009_1001_08: Oh, Penny! What’re you doing here?
episode_event_ayumi_pokekid/4009_1001_09: I could ask you the same question!
episode_event_ayumi_pokekid/4009_1001_11:
Did you know? Blue is a former Champion, and
Professor Oak’s grandson!
episode_event_ayumi_pokekid/4009_1001_12: What can I say? Classic Nemona...
episode_event_ayumi_pokekid/4009_1001_15:
If Blue thinks highly of you, then you must be
very stro—
episode_event_ayumi_pokekid/4009_1001_17: We have a question, Professor Oak!
episode_event_ayumi_pokekid/4009_1001_20: Take the Pokémon Chatot, for example...
episode_event_ayumi_pokekid/4009_1001_21:
It can imitate the cries of other Pokémon, and even
learn to speak human words.
episode_event_ayumi_pokekid/4009_1001_23: People call me the Pokémon Professor!
episode_event_ayumi_pokekid/4009_1001_26:
Apparently, it mimics the cries of other Pokémon to
trick them into thinking it’s one of them. That way
Chatot won’t be attacked.
episode_event_ayumi_pokekid/4009_1001_28:
One could theorize that a Pokémon learning to
mimic human speech is a reaction of some sort.
episode_event_ayumi_pokekid/4009_1001_29:
So you’re saying that some Pokémon might be
playing "pretend human"?
episode_event_ayumi_pokekid/4009_1001_30:
Haha! Maybe! It would be interesting to see a
Pokémon that does that!
episode_event_ayumi_pokekid/4009_1001_33: Of course! Thank you, Professor Oak!
episode_event_ayumi_pokekid/4009_1001_34:
People and Pokémon can share a silent,
heart-to-heart connection...
episode_event_ayumi_pokekid/4009_1001_35: But I would love if we could speak to each other.
episode_event_ayumi_pokekid/4009_1001_36:
If we could express our feelings in words, we’d be
even happier!
episode_event_ayumi_pokekid/4010_1001_02: Oh...so you’re looking for a talking Pokémon.
episode_event_ayumi_pokekid/4010_1001_04:
It’s not just Eevee—there’s a possibility that any
Pokémon can talk!
episode_event_ayumi_pokekid/4010_1001_05:
We’re investigating Pokémon that are friends
with people!
episode_event_ayumi_pokekid/4010_1001_07: We love Pokémon and have respect for them.
episode_event_ayumi_pokekid/4010_1001_08:
Maybe there are Pokémon that love and respect
us the same way.
episode_event_ayumi_pokekid/4010_1001_11: Did you just say something, Eve?
episode_event_ayumi_pokekid/4010_1001_15: Eugh, creepy! Big horror movie vibes...
